record.field: Tip: Speed up your workflow with shortcuts Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: Speed up your workflow with shortcuts
Press ALT in any screen to highlight shortcuts for every button in the screen. It is useful to process multiple documents in batch.

record.field: Tip: Click on an avatar to chat with a user Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: Click on an avatar to chat with a user
Have a question about a document? Click on the responsible user's picture to start a conversation. If his avatar has a green dot, he is online.

record.field: Tip: A calculator in Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: A calculator in Aumet Pharmacy
When editing a number, you can use formulae by typing the `=` character. This is useful when computing a margin or a discount on a quotation, sale order or invoice.

record.field: Tip: How to ping users in internal notes Aumet Pharmacy?

div.p: Tip: How to ping users in internal notes?
Type "@" to notify someone in a message, or "#" to link to a channel. Try to notify @Aumet Pharmacy to test the feature.

record.field: Tip: Knowledge is power Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: Knowledge is power
When following documents, use the pencil icon to fine-tune the information you want to receive. Follow a project / sales team to keep track of this project's tasks / this team's opportunities.

record.field: Tip: Aumet Pharmacy supports configurable products

div.p: Tip: Aumet Pharmacy supports configurable products

Struggling with a complex product catalog? Try out the Product Configurator to help sales configure a product with different options: colors, size, capacity, etc. Make sale orders encoding easier and error-proof.

record.field: Tip: Sell or buy products in bulk with matrixes Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: Sell or buy products in bulk with matrixes
Selling the same product in different sizes or colors? Try the product grid and populate your orders with multiple quantities of each variant. This feature also exists in the Purchase application.

record.field: Tip: How to keep late receipts under control Aumet Pharmacy?

div.p: Tip: How to keep late receipts under control?

When creating a purchase order, have a look at the vendor's On Time Delivery rate: the percentage of products shipped on time. If it is too low, activate the automated reminders. A few days before the due shipment, Aumet Pharmacy will send the vendor an email to ask confirmation of shipment dates and keep you informed in case of any delays. To get the vendor's performance statistics, click on the OTD rate.

record.field: Tip: Never miss a purchase order Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: Never miss a purchase order

When sending a purchase order by email, Aumet Pharmacy asks the vendor to acknowledge the reception of the order. When the vendor acknowledges the order by clicking on a button in the email, the information is added on the purchase order. Use filters to track orders that have not been acknowledged.

record.field: Tip: No need to print, put in an envelop and post your invoices Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: No need to print, put in an envelop and post your invoices

Use the “Send by Post” option to post invoices automatically. For the cost of a local stamp, we do all the manual work: your invoice will be printed in the right country, put in an envelop and sent by snail mail. Use this feature from the list view to post hundreds of invoices in bulk.

record.field: Tip: Speed up inventory operations with barcodes Aumet Pharmacy

div.p: Tip: Speed up inventory operations with barcodes Aumet Pharmacy

Enjoy a quick-paced experience with the Aumet Pharmacy barcode app. It is blazing fast and works even without a stable internet connection. It supports all flows: inventory adjustments, batch picking, moving lots or pallets, low inventory checks, etc. Go to the "Apps" menu to activate the barcode interface.
